profile.name: David Heffler
profile.title: Software Engineer | Mathematics & CS Student @ MSJC

about: I'm a full-stack developer based in Southern California, currently studying mathematics and computer science at MSJC while working on interesting software projects. I've had the opportunity to build production systems from scratch; Most recently developing complete storefronts and custom quoting solutions for European clients. My work typically involves TypeScript/React frontends paired with robust APIs, deployed through modern CI/CD pipelines.
